## createNearMeFilter() function

Creates a [Filter](./answers-headless.filter.md) that matches all results within a certain radius of the given position.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createNearMeFilter(position: NearFilterValue): Filter;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  position | [NearFilterValue](./answers-headless.nearfiltervalue.md) | The position and radius |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Filter](./answers-headless.filter.md)

The newly created [Filter](./answers-headless.filter.md) for the radius of the position
